entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Proposal: allow exception marshallers via '[return: MarshalUsing]' on generated COM interfaces methods without '[PreserveSig]' #109522
    Future
  • Move dotnet/runtime to new RPM tooling #109518
    10.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'bPrev->HasFlag(BBF_RETLESS_CALL)' during 'Optimize control flow' #109515
    10.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'this->Next()->KindIs(BBJ_CALLFINALLYRET)' during 'Optimize control flow' #109514
    10.0.0
  • PipeWriter.UnflushedBytes `long` property wraps to negative numbers after `int.MaxValue` #109513
  • [browser] preload satelite assemblies when culture setter was trimmed #109504
    Future
  • Contract-based polymorphic support only sometimes works, depending on casting #109502
  • Test failure: readytorun/tests/mainv1/mainv1.cmd #109500
  • Test failure: baseservices/exceptions/stackoverflow/stackoverflowtester/stackoverflowtester.cmd #109499
  • Test failure: baseservices/exceptions/regressions/V1/SEH/VJ/RecursiveException/RecursiveException.cmd #109498
  • Test failure: System.Diagnostics.Tests.PerformanceCounterCategoryTests.PerformanceCounterCategory_CategoryType_MultiInstance #109497
  • 'RuntimeType.TypeHandle' throws 'NotSupportedException' on NativeAOT after publishing with 0 ILC warnings #109496

Closed

  • Can the http headers constants be moved somewhere that isnt a "DotnetPlatform" package type? #109373
  • [wasm] System.Diagnostics.StackTrace.Tests.dll failure #108683
  • [API Proposal]: Extend `JsonPropertyName` attribute to record member declarations #109411
  • Delete IL verifier from the JIT #32648
    Future
  • Native SIGSEGV crashes in mono_method_to_ir #109111
  • X.509 Cert #109478
    Future
  • Exception.TargetSite confusion #31998
  • System.GC.Collect() cannot be called in a Lua/LuaJIT callstack #109475
    Future
  • Problems with freezing when running Process #109489

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove unused `TypeHandle::GetDefiningModuleForOpenType` #109527
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Convert dotnet/runtime to use the new Arcade tooling for RPMs #109526
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Reapply "Fix missing analyzer warning for generics in containing type" #109525
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Disable GS cookie checks for LightUnwind #109524
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • JIT: Always aggressively compact blocks #109521
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Don't convert unreachable `BBJ_CALLFINALLYRET` blocks to `BBJ_THROW` during morph #109519
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V][LoongArch64] Encode missing tailcall in GC info #109512
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [release/8.0-staging] [android] Fix crash in method_to_ir #109511
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/9.0-staging] [android] Fix crash in method_to_ir #109510
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Update area owners #109509
    area-Meta
  • [DRAFT] Allow using H/3 with WinHttpHandler #109508
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Http
  • Clean up code with `NET8_0_OR_GREATER` #109507
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • JIT: Switch BasicBlock hash code from bbNum to bbID #109506
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Add missing `lvTracked` check in `optLocalHasNonLoopUses` #109505
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Dedup remaining MemoryExtensions Span overloads #109501
    area-System.Memory

Merged

  • Update ThunkGenerator to handle multi-nested classes #109210
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Revert "Fix missing analyzer warning for generics in containing type" #109520
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/8.0-staging] Upgrade our macOS build machines to the latest non-beta x64 image #109456
    Servicing-approved, needs-area-label, 8.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] Upgrade our macOS build machines to the latest non-beta x64 image #109455
    Servicing-approved, needs-area-label, 9.0.x
  • Fix condition in PAL's SetThreadDescription #109470
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Add 3-opt implementation for improving upon RPO-based layout #103450
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix Version.Details.xml SHA typo #109389
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Delete IL verification failure helpers in importer #108996
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Adding info to debug WindowsAlternateDataStreamOverwrite failure #109399
    area-System.IO
  • [android] Fix crash in method_to_ir #109381
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/8.0] Delete accidentally checked in file: src/libraries/System.IO.Ports/tests/file.pp #109290
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO.Ports
  • Fix ifdef for RawArrayData in NativeAOT Runtime.Base #109494
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Update the CPUID and XSAVE logics for APX #104637
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • Randomized allocation sampling #104955
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2575058 #107711
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Constant Time Lookup NibbleMap #108939
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix FP state restore on macOS exception forwarding #109458
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • [ILASM] Revive #85344 #109091
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • Bump versions of maintenance-packages dependencies consumed in runtime #108806
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/9.0-staging] Switch to non-incremental servicing #109316
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.1
  • JIT: Switch config values to UTF8 #109418
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Eliminate redundant SafePasswordHandle values #109391
    area-System.Security, 10.0.0
  • Normalize markdown links #105147
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Increase timeouts in CustomConverterTests #108879
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • ARM64-SVE: Allow LCLs to be of type MASK #109286
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Upgrade our macOS build machines to the latest image #109454
    area-Infrastructure
  • [draft] New decommit strategy for large/huge regions #109431
    area-GC-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • use `Stopwatch.GetElapsedTime` for rate limiter #109213
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • System.DirectoryServices.Protocols: Force using LDAP V3 for SASL binding #109450
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • JIT: Avoid reporting call-sites in MinOpts on all targets #103950
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] [APX] Enable additional General Purpose Registers. #108799
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx, 10.0.0
  • The mask of shift amount in `IShiftOperators<byte, int, byte>` should be 7 #103900
    area-System.Numerics, breaking-change, community-contribution
  • JIT: Keep delegate object alive during invoke #105099
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • All `WasmBuildTests` use `dotnet new`, unification #109069
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • Make ToDictionary() selectors parallel. #100590
    area-System.Linq.Parallel, community-contribution
  • Avoid SerialPort IOLoop when there's no event handlers #102829
    community-contribution, area-System.IO.Ports
  • Switch DirectoryControl to use AsnWriter, AsnDecoder #101512
    NO-MERGE, area-System.DirectoryServices, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Unify two identical implementations of class_kind in SGen GC bridges #107909
    area-GC-mono, community-contribution
  • JIT: Simple importer single-block forward substitution #109482
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NOMERGE] Force log ASP.NET Errors in http-stress #109152
    area-System.Net.Http
  • JIT: Put all CSEs into SSA #106637
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Defer compilation in bblocks with unitialized stack #108731
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • JIT: implied Boolean range assertions for local prop #109481
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable Arm64 RDM on Windows #109493
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Inline properties during importation #96325
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, Future
